title: Burt's Bees Mama Belly Butter Skin Care, Pregnancy Lotion & Stretch Mark Cream, with Shea Butter and Vitamin E, 99% Natural, 6.5 Ounce
description: As you make room for baby, make room for pampering yourself too! A richly blended belly butter gently and safely moisturizes and nourishes mama’s stretching skin. Burt’s Bees Mama Bee Belly Butter with Shea Butter and Vitamin E conditions your growing belly with cocoa, shea and jojoba butters for a luxurious feel. This 99.0% natural origin, fragrance free formula can keep your skin smooth and supple as your belly stretches throughout pregnancy and even after baby arrives. This pregnancy belly butter jar is a great addition to your bath time or bedtime routine. Keep in your bathroom cabinet or bedside drawer for rich moisture when you need it. Burt’s Bees Mama Bee Belly Butter contains no phthalates, parabens, petrolatum, or SLS, and it won’t irritate your skin so you can use this balm with peace of mind. Pamper yourself during your nine month stretch, or give as a gift to a new mama!
